rockclimb: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
rockpolish: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
rockslide: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rocksmash: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
rockthrow: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
rocktomb: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
rockwrecker: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
rollingkick: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rollout: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
roost: Heals the user by half its max HP.
rototiller: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all Grass Pokémon in battle.
round: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.
sacredfire: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
safeguard: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.
sandattack: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
sandstorm: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.
sandtomb: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
savagespinout: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
scald: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
scaryface: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
scratch: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
screech: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.
searingshot: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
secretpower: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.
secretsword: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
seedbomb: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
seedflare: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
seismictoss: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
shadowball: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
shadowbone: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
shadowclaw: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
shadowforce: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn. Hits through Protect and Detect.
shadowsneak: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
sharpen: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
shatteredpsyche: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
shellsmash: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages. Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
shelltrap: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
shiftgear: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
shoreup: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
signalbeam: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
silverwind: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
simplebeam: Changes the target's ability to Simple.
sinisterarrowraid: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
sketch: Permanently becomes the target's last used move.
skullbash: Raises the user's Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.
skyattack: User charges for one turn before attacking. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
skydrop: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.
skyuppercut: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
slackoff: Heals the user by half its max HP.
slam: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
slash: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
sleeptalk: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves. Only works if the user is sleeping.
sludge: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludgebomb: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
sludgewave: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
smackdown: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.
smellingsalts: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
smog: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smokescreen: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
snarl: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
snatch: Steals the target's move, if it's self-targeted.
snore: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.
soak: Changes the target's type to Water.
softboiled: Heals the user by half its max HP.
solarbeam: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
solarblade: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
soulstealing7starstrike: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
spacialrend: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
spark: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spectralthief: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.
speedswap: Exchanges the user's Speed with the target's.
spiderweb: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
spikes: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.
spikyshield: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
spite: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.
spitup: Power is 100 times the amount of energy Stockpiled.
spotlight: Forces the target's opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
stealthrock: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
steameruption: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
steamroller: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
steelwing: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.
stickyweb: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in.
stockpile: Stores energy up to three times for use with Spit Up and Swallow.
stokedsparksurfer: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
stomp: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
stompingtantrum: Has double power if the user's last move failed.
stoneedge: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
storedpower: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
strength: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
strengthsap: Heals the user by the target's current Attack stat and lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
stringshot: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
struggle: User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.
strugglebug: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
submission: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
substitute: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.
subzeroslammer: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
suckerpunch: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
sunnyday: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.
superfang: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.
superpower: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
supersonicskystrike: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
surf: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
swagger: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.
swallow: Recovers 1/4 HP after one Stockpile, 1/2 HP after two Stockpiles, or full HP after three Stockpiles.
sweetscent: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.
swordsdance: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.
synchronoise: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
synthesis: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
tackle: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
tailglow: Raises the user's Special Attack by three stages.
tailwhip: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
tailwind: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
takedown: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
taunt: For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves.
tearfullook: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
technoblast: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
tectonicrage: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
telekinesis: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
teleport: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
thousandarrows: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
thousandwaves: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
thrash: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
throatchop: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.
thunder: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderfang: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
thunderpunch: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thundershock: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
tickle: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.
torment: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row.
toxic: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
toxicspikes: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.
toxicthread: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.
transform: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.
triattack: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
trickortreat: Adds Ghost to the target's types.
trickroom: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.
triplekick: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
tropkick: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
trumpcard: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.
twineedle: Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
twinkletackle: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
twister: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
uproar: Forced to use this move for several turns. Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.
uturn: User must switch out after attacking.
vacuumwave: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
vcreate: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
venomdrench: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
venoshock: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
vinewhip: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
voltswitch: User must switch out after attacking.
volttackle: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
wakeupslap: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
waterfall: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
watergun: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
waterpledge: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.
waterpulse: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
waterspout: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
weatherball: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather's type.
whirlpool: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.
whirlwind: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
wideguard: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
wildcharge: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wingattack: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
wish: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
withdraw: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.
wonderroom: All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
woodhammer: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
workup: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
worryseed: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.
wrap: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
wringout: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
xscissor: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
yawn: Target sleeps at the end of the next turn.
zapcannon: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
zenheadbutt: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
zingzap: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
appleacid: Apple Acid inflicts damage and lowers the target's Special Defense stat by one stage.
astralbarrage: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
aurawheel: Aura Wheel inflicts damage and raises the user's Speed stat by one stage. Its type changes depending on Morpeko's current mode.
behemothbash: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target.
behemothblade: If the target is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, its damage is doubled.
bodypress: Body Press inflicts damage, but it uses the user's Defense stat instead of its Attack stat to calculate damage
boltbeak: If the user attacks before the target, or if the target switches in during the turn that Bolt Beak is used, its base power doubles to 170.
clangoroussoul: raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed by one stage each, at the cost of 1/3 of its maximum HP.
courtchange: causes any active battle effects to swap sides. This affects barriers like Reflect, multi-turn effects like Tailwind, and entry hazards like Spikes.
doubleironbash: deals damage, will strike twice (with 60 base power each time), and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch (if the target has not yet moved)
dualwingbeat: inflicts damage, hitting twice per use. Each strike has an equal chance to be a critical hit.
dynamaxcannon: deals damage. If the target is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, its damage is doubled.
expandingforce: If Psychic Terrain is in effect and the user is grounded upon its execution, this move gets a 1.5× power increase
fierywrath: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack.
fishiousrend: If the user attacks before the target, or if the target switches in during the turn that Fishious Rend is used, its base power doubles to 170.
flipturn: Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.
freezingglare: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.
glaciallance: deals damage to all adjacent opponents.
grassyglide: inflicts damage. If Grassy Terrain is in effect and the user is grounded upon its execution, this move's priority is increased to +1.
gravapple: inflicts damage and lowers the target's Defense stat by one stage.
junglehealing: The user restors HP and healing any status conditions of itself.
kingsshield: King's Shield protects the user from all effects of physical and special moves that target it during the turn it is used.
noretreat: raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
overdrive: inflicts damage to all opponents. Overdrive can hit Pokémon even if they are behind a substitute.
poltergeist: The user attacks the target by controlling the target's item. The move fails if the target doesn't have an item.
pyroball: thaw out the user if it is frozen, and then inflict damage on the target. Pyro Ball also has a 10% chance of burning the target. It has no effect on Pokémon with the Bulletproof Ability.
risingvoltage: deals damage. If the target is affected by Electric Terrain upon the move's execution, Rising Voltage's base power is doubled to 140.
scorchingsands: inflicts damage and has a 30% chance of burning the target. Scorching Sands will thaw the user if frozen.
shellsidearm: deals damage and has a 20% chance of poisoning the target.
spiritbreak: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
strangesteam: does normal damage and has a chance of inflicting confusion status.
surgingstrikes: inflicts damage, hitting its target three times per use.
tripleaxel: inflicts damage, hitting the target up to three times per use. Its base power will increase by 20 with each successive strike.
wickedblow: inflicts damage and will always result in a critical hit unless the target has Battle Armor or Shell Armor
